snippet: Recent floods in Niger have killed 91 people and caused significant damage, according to a top official, Aghaly Abdoulkader, who is the director of the cabinet.
abstract: Floods in Niger have killed 91 people and caused significant damage to rice paddies, schools, health centers, and roads, and destroyed large quantities of food and cattle.
lead_paragraph: Recent floods in Niger have killed 91 people and caused significant damage, according to a top official, Aghaly Abdoulkader, who is the director of the cabinet.
